version_description:
- fixed bug with inventory and inventory boxes;
- fixed critical bugs;

In this update (2.0):
* New construction mode - a lot of new construction details, configurations;
* New big island - in next updates there will be new locations and events;
* Modified craft and weapon system;
* New UI;
* Big bug fix;
* New character animations;
* New items to craft + workbench mechanics added;

In this update (2.1):
* New construction mode - a lot of new construction details, configurations;
* New big island - in next updates there will be new locations and events;
* Modified craft and weapon system;
* New UI;
* Big bug fix;
* New character animations;
* New items to craft + workbench mechanics added;
* Fixed shop;

- remastered Island near spawn zone;
- added more animals and resources near spawn zone;
- new weather system;
- added in-game time;
- graphics improvements;
- modified animals AI - new animals navigation system;
- remastered sounds;
- fixed bugs;

- Island completely rebuilt;
- Huge amount of resources;
- Optimization and bug fix;
- A lot of animals on the island;
- Graphics improvements;
- Balance fixes;
- UI changed;

- Added car respawn
- Bugfix
- Optimization
- Ad fix

Added new islands
Added new construction items
Added new armor sets
Added backpacks system, now you can expand your inventory
Added boat stations where you can respawn boats
Added new enemies
Added new workstations, redesigned crafting system
Updated models of items and weapons
Fixed game balance
Bugfix
Performance optimization

- UI refactor
- Balance fixes
- Added ragdoll physics
- Bugfix

- Added settlers to the island
- Added lift in craft
- Bugfix
- Improved graphics
- Improved stability
- Balance fixes

- UI refactor
- Balance fixes
- Added ragdoll physics
- Bugfix
